name: GenericValidator_matchRegexpTest
description: Unit tests for the matchRegexp method in GenericValidator.

test_cases.name: testMatchRegexp_ValidPattern
test_cases.description: Tests the matchRegexp method with a valid pattern.

test_cases.name: testMatchRegexp_InvalidPattern
test_cases.description: Tests the matchRegexp method with an invalid pattern.

test_cases.name: testMatchRegexp_NullPattern
test_cases.description: Tests the matchRegexp method with a null pattern.

test_cases.name: testMatchRegexp_EmptyPattern
test_cases.description: Tests the matchRegexp method with an empty pattern.
